div.div: Facebook for iPhone App - User Guide
Chapter . Navigation
Chapter . What is Facebook?
Facebook is a social media application.
Chapter . Why use Facebook?
Facebook can be used to connect and share with people and businesses.
Chapter . Downloading the Facebook iPhone App
Facebook iPhone App can be downloaded from the Apple AppStore.
Chapter . Creating a Facebook Account
Create a Facebook Account in your Facebook App on your iPhone to use Facebook to share and connect with people and businesses.
Chapter . Navigating the Facebook App
This document shows the different navigation options available in the facebook app.
Chapter . Adding Facebook Friends
This document describes how to add facebook friends.
Chapter . How does Facebook sharing work?
This document describes the ways how facebook sharing works.
Chapter . Posting a Status Update
This document list steps about how to post a status update using the facebook app.
Chapter . Sharing Types
status update, posting on friends' timeline, photos, links, feeling/activity, location, likes, comments and resharing.
Chapter . Notification Types
push notifications, in-app notifications.

div.p: Facebook is a social media application.

Facebook is a free social networking site that makes it easy for you to connect and share with family and friends online. Originally designed for college students, Facebook was created in 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg while he was enrolled at Harvard University. By 2006, anyone over the age of 13 with a valid email address could join Facebook. Today, Facebook is the world's largest social network, with more than 1 billion users worldwide.

html.css:font-family: serif, Times, Times New Roman, DejaVu Serif, Symbol, SimSun, MingLiU, MS Mincho, Batang, Vijaya, Noto Serif CJK SC, Noto Serif CJK JP, Noto Serif CJK KR, Arial Unicode MS

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: Facebook can be used to connect and share with people and businesses.

Have you ever wondered why people like using Facebook? After all, there are already a lot of other ways to communicate online, like through email, instant messaging, and so on. What makes Facebook unique is the ability to connect and share with the people you care about at the same time.

For many, having a Facebook account is now an expected part of being online, much like having your own email address. And because Facebook is so popular, other websites have worked to integrate Facebook. This means you can use a single Facebook account to sign in to different services across the Web.

div.p: Facebook iPhone App can be downloaded from the Apple AppStore.

section.p: 1. This task will show you steps to download facebook iPhone App.
2. You need to download the Facebook App to use Facebook on an iPhone.
3. You will download the App to use Facebook on your iPhone to share and connect with people and businesses.

li.span: To download the App, Search Facebook on the Apple AppStore.
Tap this (cloud with down arrow) button to begin downloading the App.
When the download is complete, Press the Open button or locate and tap the Facebook icon on the iPhone screen.

div.section: You have the Facebook App on your iPhone.

html.css:font-family: serif, Times, Times New Roman, DejaVu Serif, Symbol, SimSun, MingLiU, MS Mincho, Batang, Vijaya, Noto Serif CJK SC, Noto Serif CJK JP, Noto Serif CJK KR, Arial Unicode MS

div.p: Create a Facebook Account in your Facebook App on your iPhone to use Facebook to share and connect with people and businesses.

section.p: Download Facebook app from the AppStore.
1. Use the steps mentioned here to create a new facebook account on the facebook app.
2. Creating a new facebook account is necessary before you can use the facebook app.
3. Facebook app requires you to create a free account in order to use their social media application.

li.span: Tap the icon to start the App.
Tap Sign Up for Facebook.
Tap Get Started to Begin.
Enter an email address or phone number.
Enter your name.
Create a password.
Next, you'll need to add some basic information about yourself.
Once you are finished, you'll have a chance to set your profile picture.
You can take a new picture or you can choose from one on your camera roll.

Finally, you'll have a chance to search for people you already know on Facebook so you can quickly begin adding friends. But if you decide to skip this step for now, you'll still be able to search and add friends at a later time.

div.section: You have a new facebook account. You can log in with this new account.

div.p: This document shows the different navigation options available in the facebook app.

section.p: Download Facebook app from the AppStore.
Create a facebook user account.
1. This task focuses on effectively navigationg through the different options available in the facebook app.
2. This task can be used as a resource to share your status, photo or your location in the facebook app.
3. These steps can be performed to navigate in the facebook app.

li.span: Locate the Navigation bar in the App.
Update your status using the status option.
Share a photo with the photo option.
Check-in at a location using the check-in option.
Tap Search at the top of the screen to search for people, groups or organizations.
This button allows you to accept Friend requests.
This button allows you to get messages.
This button allows you to get notifications.
This button brings you more options.
Go back to your news feed by tapping this button.

div.section: You now know the different sharing options avaiable it you through the facebook app.

div.p: This document describes how to add facebook friends.
div.section: You should have your facebook profile or create one before you begin this task .

section.p: 1. You can add new facebook friends using the steps mentioned in this task.
2. If you want to add new friends on facebook, use this task.
3. New facebook friends can be added to your facebook account using these steps.

li.span: Tap the friends button to see a list of people you may know.
If you see someone you know, you can send them a friend request by tapping Add.
Tap this button on top to see more options.
From here you can see Friend suggestions, Search for friends, Connect with friends through your contacts, and View your current friends.
You can respond to Friend requests here too.
To accept a friend request, tap Confirm.
You can tap for friends by tapping Search, then typing in a friend's name.

html.css:font-family: serif, Times, Times New Roman, DejaVu Serif, Symbol, SimSun, MingLiU, MS Mincho, Batang, Vijaya, Noto Serif CJK SC, Noto Serif CJK JP, Noto Serif CJK KR, Arial Unicode MS

div.p: This document describes the ways how facebook sharing works.

Facebook allows you to send messages and post status updates to keep in touch with friends and family. You can also share different types of content, like photos and links. But sharing something on Facebook is a bit different from other types of online communication. Unlike email or instant messaging, which are relatively private, the things you share on Facebook are more public, which means they'll usually be seen by many other people.

While Facebook offers privacy tools to help you limit who can see the things you share, it's important to understand that Facebook is designed to be more open and social than traditional communication tools.

html.css:font-family: serif, Times, Times New Roman, DejaVu Serif, Symbol, SimSun, MingLiU, MS Mincho, Batang, Vijaya, Noto Serif CJK SC, Noto Serif CJK JP, Noto Serif CJK KR, Arial Unicode MS

div.p: This document list steps about how to post a status update using the facebook app.

section.p: Download Facebook app from the AppStore.
Open facebook app.
1. This task describes the steps to post a status update in the facebook app.
2. Use this task to post a status update on your facebook account timeline and newfeed.
3. If you want to post a status update on your facebook account timeline and newsfeed, use this task.

li.span: Tap the status button.
Use the audience selector to control who can see your status update.
You have several options when posting a status. It can just be text or you can include a picture or a description of what you are doing.
If you want people to know where you are, you can include a location.
If you want to include one or more of your friends, you can tag them in your status by tapping this button, then making your selection.
When you are finished, tap Post.

div.section: Your status update will appear on your timeline and newsfeed.
